properties.name: key
properties.description: Form key.

properties.name: tip
properties.description: Form tip text.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Specifies if the form is required or not.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Form placeholder text.

properties.name: comb
properties.description: Specifies if the text field should be a comb of characters with the same cell width. The maximum number of characters must be set to a positive value.

properties.name: maxCharacters
properties.description: The maximum number of characters in the text field.

properties.name: cellWidth
properties.description: The cell width for each character measured in millimeters. If this parameter is not specified or equal to 0 or less, then the width will be set automatically.

properties.name: multiLine
properties.description: Specifies if the current fixed size text field is multiline or not.

properties.name: autoFit
properties.description: Specifies if the text field content should be autofit, i.e. whether the font size adjusts to the size of the fixed size form.

properties.name: placeholderFromSelection
properties.description: Specifies if the currently selected text should be saved as a placeholder of the inserted form.

properties.name: keepSelectedTextInForm
properties.description: Specifies if the currently selected text should be saved as the content of the inserted form.

properties.name: radio
properties.description: Specifies if the current checkbox is a radio button. In this case, the key parameter is considered as an identifier for the group of radio buttons.

properties.name: editable
properties.description: Specifies if the combo box text can be edited.

properties.name: autoFit
properties.description: Specifies if the combo box form content should be autofit, i.e. whether the font size adjusts to the size of the fixed size form.

properties.name: items
properties.description: The combo box items. This array consists of strings or arrays of two strings where the first string is the displayed value and the second one is its meaning. If the array consists of single strings, then the displayed value and its meaning are the same. Example: ["First", ["Second", "2"], ["Third", "3"], "Fourth"].

ScaleFlag.name: ScaleFlag
ScaleFlag.description: The condition to scale an image in the picture form.

properties.name: scaleFlag
properties.description: The condition to scale an image in the picture form: "always", "never", "tooBig" or "tooSmall".

properties.name: lockAspectRatio
properties.description: Specifies if the aspect ratio of the picture form is locked or not.

properties.name: respectBorders
properties.description: Specifies if the form border width is respected or not when scaling the image.

properties.name: shiftX
properties.description:
Horizontal picture position inside the picture form measured in percent:

  • 0 - the picture is placed on the left;
  • 50 - the picture is placed in the center;
  • 100 - the picture is placed on the right.

properties.name: shiftY
properties.description:
Vertical picture position inside the picture form measured in percent:

  • 0 - the picture is placed on top;
  • 50 - the picture is placed in the center;
  • 100 - the picture is placed on the bottom.
